139032.「なんだか ここを封印している魔物は\n 学園の魔物に比べて 強い気がしますね…:
Somehow I feel that the MONSTER that has
sealed this place is stronger than the MONSTER
in the academy...

139036.「……侵入者が ウェスリーと\n 決まったわけじゃないし\n 今は そのことを:
...We haven't decided that the intruder was
Wesley, and I think it's best to let that go
for now.

139038.「忘れろって なんだよ！\n 俺にとって あいつは……！:
What do you mean, forget about it? For me,
that guy..!

139052.「あ～あ……結局 バレちゃったじゃん。:
Ahhhh...they found out in the end, didn't
they?

139057.「……そう。オレは 魔物さ。\n アンタたち人間が恐れる 魔族ってやつ。:
Yes, I'm a monster. I am the monster, the
demon you humans fear.

139059.「……何かの冗談だろ リソル？\n お前が魔族だってんなら どうして学園で\n:
If you're a demon, how come you're a student
at the school?

139061.「オレって 魔族の中でも エリートなんだよね。\n それで 魔界にいる オレのあ:
I am Ellie in Demon World. So I was sent to
Astoltia by my boss in Demon World.

139065.「あはっ。すごい みっともないカオしてる。\n 仲間扱いしてきた相手が よりによ:
Oh, haha, you've got such an embarrassing
face. How do you feel now that the person who
treated you like a companion is now a demon?

139067.「クククッ……まんまと ダマされやがって\n やっぱり 人間ってやつは バカだね:
Kukkuk....you were fooled, human beings are
idiots after all!

139071.「……オレは フウキをやめる。\n 仲良しごっこは もう おわりだ。: I'm quitting SCC. I'm done playing nice.

139080.「我を失っている……。\n こうなれば 私が 手を汚してでも……。:
I'm losing my mind... If this happens, I'll
get my hands dirty...

139081.「いや……俺たちが 大人しくさせてみせる。\n フウキの 絆のチカラでな。:
No...we'll make them quiet with the power of
the SCC bond.

139082.「リソルくん……今度は あたしが助ける番だよ。: Resol...it's my turn to help you.

139083.「キミたちに 賭けてみよう。\n この屋上に 目隠しの結界を張った。\n 彼を:
I'll bet on you. I've put a blindfold on this
rooftop. Stop him!

139085.「くそっ……こんなになるまで\n ボッコボコに しやがって……。\n 日頃のオレ:
Damn... you beat me up until I was like
this... You were just getting over your daily
grudge against me.

139086.「どうやら 正気に戻ったみたいだな。: Apparently, you've come to your senses.

139088.「よかった……か。\n ここまで 来てくれた\n アンタらには 悪いんだけどさ。:
I'm glad...huh? I'm sorry for you guys who
came all this way, but...

139089.「こんな姿じゃ 学園にはいられないし\n いつまた 暴走するか わからない。\n:
I can't stay in the academy looking like this,
and I don't know when I'll run amok again.
That's why I'm going back to Demon World...

139090.「そんな。お別れなんて……！:
Oh, no. I can't believe I have to say
goodbye..!

139091.「何か その自分のチカラを\n 抑える方法は ないのか？: Is there any way to suppress my power?

139093.「なんだよ なにがあるっていうのさ。\n ドラキー女……。: What's there to say, Dracky woman...

139094.「強すぎる魔力が 暴走させている。\n だから わたしが……。:
The magic is too strong and is causing it to
run amok. That's why I...

139098.「…………リソル 魔界 帰らなくていい。:
...Resol Demon World You don't have to go
home.

139101.「それだけはやめろと\n 止めたのに なぜ やってしまったのじゃ！:
I told you not to do that, but why did you do
it?

139102.「魔族なんぞの 異質な魔力を吸収して\n 大事な身体に 異常をきたしたりしたら\:
What if he absorbs demons' foreign magic and
causes some kind of physical problem?

139104.「コリャ～！ 反抗期か お前は～～！？: Oh no~! Are you in rebellion?

139108.「今まで通りなんて……ウソっぱちだ。\n アンタらが 本心で そう思うわけがない:
It's a lie to say that things are the same as
before.

139109.「アンタらは オレに だまされ続けてきたんだ。\n 魔族だと知らずに 付き合って:
You guys have been cheated by me for so long, you should clearly tell me that you went along with me without knowing that I was a demon,
and that it was a big pain in the ass!

139110.「まったく 何言ってんだ？\n そんなことで 俺たちの気持ちが……。:
Totally. What are you talking about? That's
how we feel...

139111.「そういうのが マジで 寒いっていうんだよッ！\n アンタらが 今まで通り この:
That's what's called really cold! There's no
way you guys want to stay with me as we are
now!

139112.「……<pc>。この わからず屋に\n あれを 渡してやったらどうだ？:
...<pc>. Why don't you give that
thing to this know-nothing?

139113.「俺たちの思いが 言葉で伝わらないなら\n 目に見える証拠で 示してやるしかねぇ:
If words can't convey our feelings, then we
have to show them with tangible proof. That's
what this guy was really looking for.
<select>
Pass SCC Emblem to Resol
Do not pass
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

139114.「他の誰よりも リーダーから 渡してあげるのが\n いちばん いいと思うんだ。ね:
I think it's best to give it to the leader of
the group first. Please.
<select>
Pass SCC Emblem to Resol
Do not pass
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

139115.<if_woman>「まったく。<pc>ちゃんが\n そこまで言うなら……\n:
<if_woman>I'll give it to Mr. Resol. If <pc>
says so much...I'll give it to Resol.<else>I'll give it to Mr. Resol. If <pc>
says so much...I'll give it to Resol.<endif>

139116.クラウンは <pc>から\nリソルのフウキの証を 受け取った。:
Crown received Resol's SCC Emblem from
<pc>.

139117.「な…なんだよ。コレ？\n オレが せっかく ぶっ壊したものを\n 頼んでもない:
What...what is this? This? I broke something,
and they fixed it up without even asking me
to...

139118.<pc>は リソルに\nリソルのフウキの証を 手渡した。:
<pc> handed Resol the Resol's SCC
Emblem.

139120.「お前は 今まで\n 何度も俺たちを助けてくれた……。: You have saved us many times before...

139121.「そんなに俺たちのこと 考えてくれる奴が \n 人間だろうと 魔族だろうと 関係:
Who cares if the guy who thinks about us so
much is a human or a demon?

139122.「俺たちは リソルが リソルだからこそ\n これからも 一緒にいたいって 言って:
We say we want to stay together because Resol
is Resol!

139125.「あたしを 助けてくれて ありがとう。\n それから……。: Thank you for saving me. And...
